column1: Content
This movie deserves a theatre release
10/10 trailer, no big plots revealed or spoilers, just action and a bit of lore!
I love when a movie is so brilliant it feels like a video game that will never exist
That helicopter scene at the end is one of the best scenes ever made already. The cinemtography on that was Immense.
Absolutely love the long take realistic action sequences that modern action movies are doing!
This looks amazing im so excited the first film was so realistic and had a brilliant storyline  the action in this teaser trailer so far looks phenomenal
This is how you do trailers. A single scene that shows the vibe of the film without revealing any major story arcs that would otherwise spoil an exciting film.
Finally. A movie filmed like a video game
Até arrepiei... Daora demais!!
Como sempre, senquencias de filmagens sensacionais. Um dos filmes com as melhores jogadas de câmera que já vi.

PELÍCULAS CON GRAN CALIDAD EN EL GÉNERO DE ACCIÓN HAN SIDO EL DISTINTIVO DE NETFLIX ESTOS AÑOS , Y ESPERAMOS SINCERAMENTE QUE VAYAMOS DE MENOS A MÁS Y DE BIEN A MEJOR CHRIS HEMSWORTH ES DE LO MÁS DESTACADO QUE TIENE HOLLYWOOD ACTUALMENTE PARA ESTE TIPO DE PRODUCCIONES . FELICIDADES NETFLIX Y GRACIAS .
Please keep these movies coming they are exactly what fans want.
Whoever made this trailer deserves an award. Well done.

There will always be “better” movies, but these ridiculous action movies just absolutely do it for me. They remind me of when I was a kid, and the scenarios I’d set up for my action figures. Looking forward to this one.
The cinematography is INSANE!!! I loved the first movie so I'm looking forward for this one
Forgot that they said they’d do a third. Loved the first one, stoked for this one!

This is more like a video game than a movie, and I love it.

I loved the cinematography on the first one, and so glad to see this one has similar experimental scenes as well. Look at the transition from a hand held camera to one that is attached to Hemsworth’s body when he gets stunned by a hit at 00:32. After this, the camera is on a harness fixed to Hemsworth until 00:56, where it seamlessly cuts to the hand held camera once again. Brilliant, and so creative.
Bence muhteşem bir film olucak
I'm honestly surprised at how good this trailer is... got chills.

Oh my goodness!!!
